docs.snippet: A federal judge in Nevada dismissed a criminal case Monday against a wealthy Malaysian gambler who was arrested last year after FBI agents impersonated Internet repair technicians to get a peek at what he was doing in suites at a Las Vegas Strip r...
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal judge in Nevada dismissed a criminal case Monday against a wealthy Malaysian gambler who was arrested last year after FBI agents impersonated Internet repair technicians to get a peek at what he was doing in suites at a Las Vegas Strip resort.

headline.main: US Judge Dismisses World Cup Case Against Malaysian Gambler
headline.print_headline: US Judge Dismisses World Cup Case Against Malaysian Gambler

docs.snippet: A memorial for the 1972 attack will be built in Munich this year, and Olympic officials have shown support for recognition at the Rio Games....
docs.lead_paragraph: A memorial for the 1972 attack will be built in Munich this year, and Olympic officials have shown support for recognition at the Rio Games.
docs.abstract: German government officials say construction is set to begin on long-awaited memorial for victims of terrorist attack at 1972 Munich Olympics, in which 11 Israeli athletes and coaches were taken hostage by members of Palestinian group Black September.

headline.main: Families of 1972 Munich Victims Find New Hope for Remembrance
headline.print_headline: New Hope for Families After Years of Silence

docs.snippet: Just beyond the gated entrance to the tiny Catskills community of Holy Islamberg, population 200, cows graze and ducks glide on a tranquil pond. Modest houses of wood and cinder block sit along the hamlet's single thoroughfare, a rutted dirt road ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Just beyond the gated entrance to the tiny Catskills community of Holy Islamberg, population 200, cows graze and ducks glide on a tranquil pond. Modest houses of wood and cinder block sit along the hamlet's single thoroughfare, a rutted dirt road without traffic signs.

headline.main: A Tranquil Muslim Hamlet in the Catskills-Until the Attack Plot
headline.print_headline: A Tranquil Muslim Hamlet in the Catskills-Until the Attack Plot
